post.description: Get, set, add or remove properties from jail(s).
Convert a jail from thin to thick; convert a jail to a custom release.
Copy file(s)/directorie(s) from host to jail(s).
Copy file(s)/directorie(s) from jail to jail(s).
Apply resources limits to jail(s). See rctl(8) and cpuset(1).
List jails, releases, templates and more...
Migrate jail(s) to a remote system.
Monitor and attempt to restart jail service(s).
Add or remove interface(s) from jail(s).
Manage packages inside jail(s). See pkg(8).
Copy file(s)/directorie(s) from jail to host.
Redirect host port to jail port.
Auto-configure network, firewall, storage and more...
Add or remove tags to jail(s).
Upgrade a jail to new release.
Compare release against a "known good" index.

get.description: Return supported options and parameters for any command

200.description: Command specs for the requested command
